name: Kimbark Street
description:
Kimbark Street Wred, California, 1949 In the depths of the northern Sierra Nevada mountains lies the town of Wred, California. Touted as a "pioneer town", the intricate brick work lays upons the rotten wood of the 1800s.  An influx of new residents has made the city a promising new outpost for an influx and boom in American culture.  On March 1st, 1949, John Freeman killed two men and buried their bodies in the woods two miles out from Kimbark street.  And now he just needs to wait for the evidence to rot. Game features: 2 unique character sprites 4 unique endings Expected 2 hours of gameplay 2 custom OST tracks Free

Kimbark street was made in 2 weeks for the annual NaNoRenO visual novel game jam. Please report any bugs to the comments.
